articles.title: 'Help us': Hundreds deported from US held in Panama hotel - BBC.com
articles.description: Indians, Afghans and Sri Lankans are among the undocumented migrants unable to leave the hotel after being deported.
articles.content:
Cecilia Barría, Santiago Vanegas and Ángel Bermúdez
Two people who have been deported from the US ask for help from the window of the Decápolis Hotel in Panama City 
In a room at the luxury Decápol… [+6837 chars]
